text: Robert Felix Torti (born October 22, 1961) is an American actor and singer. Torti was born in Van Nuys, California. His career began with his role as Jesus and Jack in both the New York City and Los Angeles stage productions of Reefer Madness. He also played Kurt Martin on the Disney television series The Suite Life of Zack & Cody and The Suite Life on Deck. ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 births Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Robert Torti
